title: Can You Rhyme? (Chantel Calloway & Renee King Interview and Eddie Huang)
itunes:title: Can You Rhyme? (Chantel Calloway & Renee King Interview and Eddie Huang)
description:
Today on the show we had Chantel Calloway & Renee King stop by where they spoke about funding Black Businesses, Crowdfunding, their game Rhyme Antics and more. Also they had the director of the movie Eddie Huang "Boogie" call in where he spoke about working with Pop Smoke, asian culture and more. And Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Garrett Miller one of the rioters that stormed the Capitol and Angela nominated Nischelle Turner for being the first black woman to host Entertainment "Tonight"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had Chantel Calloway & Renee King stop by where they spoke about funding Black Businesses, Crowdfunding, their game Rhyme Antics and more. Also they had the director of the movie Eddie Huang "Boogie" call in where he spoke about working with Pop Smoke, asian culture and more. And Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Garrett Miller one of the rioters that stormed the Capitol and Angela nominated Nischelle Turner for being the first black woman to host Entertainment "Tonight"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
